DOC.brief_summary: Needle size from22 to 25 were used for fine needle aspiration of palpable breast lumps. In this study we choose one, randomly, and fallow the result of cytologic evaluation regarding specimen adequacy.
DOC.brief_title: Best Needle Size for FNA of Palpable Breast Mass:Randomised Controlled Study
DOC.detailed_description: Patient assigned randomly to FNA of palpable breast mass with different needle size:21-22-23-24
DOC.criteria: Any Woman with palpable Breast Mass Previous open Biopsy or Surgery Active infection Breast cysts Patient refusal to do FNA
